omopColumns.name: person_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DOB
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DOB

omopColumns.name: year_of_birth
omopColumns.operation_description: Selects the year from a date or null of the date is null.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DOB
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DOB

omopColumns.name: month_of_birth
omopColumns.operation_description: Selects the month of the year or null if the date is null.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DOB
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DOB

omopColumns.name: day_of_birth
omopColumns.operation_description: Selects the day of the month or null if the date is null.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DOB
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DOB

omopColumns.name: birth_datetime
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DOB
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DOB

omopColumns.name: ethnicity_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `0`. Unknown concept
